Articles.Content:
PYLO - Moho's new home

Download: SpaceDock

Bodies:

  • Pylo: A planet nearly the size of Kerbin with a superheated atmosphere and fiery oceans of molten rock.
  • Moho: Pylo's binary partner. Unaltered in physical characteristics.
  • Stad: A smaller moon. Nothing much to say here.
  • Dys: [CLASSIFIED]

 

Requires: Kopernicus, Niako's Kopernicus Utils, VertexColorMapEmissive

License: MIT
Im gonna try this out later, great work!

After trying this, I get the error in my kopernicus logs: "Failed to load Body: Pylo: Value cannot be null.
Parameter name: type" and thats very strange to me as your pictures show the planets and I have the dependencies installed, however it is possible I dont have them all installed as I could not figure out what "VertexColorMapEmmisive" was and just assumed it was Kopernicus Expanison Contiuned-er

Edited 14 hours ago by jebmothman
